duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and understand their requirements and translate them into comprehensive Salesforce solutions.
Define and document the technical architecture, solution design, and data model using best practices and Salesforce standards.
Provide expert guidance to development teams in implementing complex Salesforce solutions, ensuring adherence to best practices and architectural guidelines.
Oversee and contribute to the customization and development of Salesforce functionalities, using Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, and other relevant technologies.
Architect and implement integrations between Salesforce and other systems, both on-premises and cloud-based, using APIs, middleware, and integration platforms.
Define and implement testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the quality and reliability of solutions.
Work closely with cross-functional teams including business analysts, project managers, developers, and administrators to align solution architecture with business goals.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of end to end salesforce solutions/implementation
